detection template.from sentence: We used a detection template of 24 24 pixels .

maximum depth.from sentence: We set the maximum depth of the tree classifiers to be learned as eight , so that at most eight NPD features need to be evaluated for each tree classifier .

soft cascade training.from sentence: In the soft cascade training , we set the threshold of each exit as the minimal score of positive samples , i.e. we did not reject positive samples during training .

Our final detector.from sentence: Our final detector contains 1,226 deep quadratic trees , and 46,401 NPD features .

subset of the training data.from sentence: A subset of the training data 2 in was used , including 12,102 face images and 12,315 nonface images .

detector cascade.from sentence: The detector cascade contains 15 stages , and for each stage , the target false accept rate was 0.5 , with a detection rate of 0.999 .

using: classic cascade of regression trees ( CART )
near frontal face detector.from sentence: For an analysis , we also trained a near frontal face detector using the proposed NPD features and the classic cascade of regression trees ( CART ) with depth of four .
